statements: UPDATE compliance_monitoring SET regulatory_requirements = TRUE, adherence_to_standards = FALSE WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_monitoring SET certifications = 'ISO 9001', regulatory_requirements = FALSE WHERE vendor_id = 2;
UPDATE compliance_monitoring SET adherence_to_standards = TRUE, certifications = 'ISO 9001' WHERE vendor_id = 123;
UPDATE compliance_monitoring SET vendor_name = 'ABC Corp', regulatory_requirements = FALSE WHERE vendor_id = 456;
UPDATE vendor_compliance SET certification_status='Expired' WHERE vendor_id=1;
UPDATE vendor_compliance SET vendor_name='New Vendor Name', regulatory_compliance='Compliant' WHERE vendor_id=2;
UPDATE vendor_compliance SET certification_status = 'Approved' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE regulatory_requirements SET deadline = '2023-10-30', description = 'Update based on new regulations' WHERE requirement_id = 5;
UPDATE VendorCompliance SET certification_status='Pending' WHERE vendor_id=101
UPDATE Certifications SET validity_period='2023-12-31' WHERE certification_id=201
UPDATE VendorCompliance SET regulatory_requirements = 'ISO 9001', certification_status = 'Expired' WHERE vendor_id = 123;
UPDATE Certifications SET certification_name = 'ISO 27001', validity_period = '2023-12-31' WHERE certification_id = 456;
UPDATE Vendor SET name='New Vendor Name' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Compliance SET date_checked='2022-03-15', status='Passed' WHERE id=3;
UPDATE Vendor SET location = 'New York', certification = 'ISO 9001' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE Vendor SET vendor_name = 'Updated Vendor Name' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE Certifications SET cert_description = 'Updated Certification Description', cert_validity_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE cert_id = 3;
UPDATE Vendor SET vendor_name = 'New Vendor Name', vendor_location = 'Updated Location' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE Certifications SET cert_validity_date = '2023-06-30', cert_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE cert_id = 5;
